name: Yeti Rider 360º
description:
A game made for the 2020 Unreal Spring Jam by Yoel De Sanctis Clemente and Óscar Sánchez Navarro

When the cold winter is over... It's hiking time! And that means lots of people going outside to the nature to enjoy a breath of fresh forest air. But little they know of what hides there, up in the mountain. He is hairy, big and strong, but more importantly, hungry. He loves snowboard also. One would think that the lack of snow would prevent this treacherous yeti from practising his favourite sport. Unfortunately, when lunch is ready to be eaten you have to use everything at your disposal to take a bite as fast as possible before it escapes.

----- INSTRUCTIONS -----

The player controls a snowboarder yeti. He has to avoid the obstacles on the way, while eating humans ( to heal wounds caused by anyunfortunate impacts). While doing so, he must prove his snowboarding skills by going between the flags that appear on the trail to earn as many points possible.

----- CONTROLS -----

AWSD, Arrow Keys or Left Stick (Gamepad) to MOVE

Space or Face Button Down (Gamepad) to Jump

Music and SFX by Óscar Sánchez Navarro

Art Design by Yoel De Sanctis
